name: INPUT IS NOT REAL
description:
INPUT IS NOT REAL is a 2D puzzle platformer developed by BlurOne! and ATREUS_R, with the main mechanic being that what you have written in The Input Device won't be real. There are currently 3 levels, each with four stages and their own mechanics, each mechanic containing it's list of keywords for the input.

Controls:

Horizontal: A-D / Arrow Keys
Jump: W / Z / Spacebar
Open input: Enter / X / Click on input
Exit input: Enter / Esc

Hints:

Opening the input slows down time.

When using Gravity is not real, you retain your previous momentum, so using Friction is not real before that may be a good idea sometimes. Without momentum, you can move horizontally only when touching walls.

Light is not real deactivates collision for light blocks.

Music made by Loluchi12.

This is our first time participating in a GameJam, and our first finished game, we will continue to develop and polish it after the GameJam. Enjoy!
